English: Guangxi, a province in China next to Guangdong (Canton)
Yulin, or Watlam, a city in Guangxi Province, China
Nanning, the capital city of Guangxi Province, China
Fa Yuen Street at Mong Kok, a street where stalls with fresh fruits and vegetables intermingle with the clothing and other items.
Hung Fook Tong, a famous retailer of Chinese herbal products in Hong Kong.
